mapper.select:
SELECT a.user_id userId, a.user_account account, a.user_name name, a.create_at createAt, ( fanyong_income + share_income + other_income - withdrawed ) withdraw, withdrawed withdrawed, info_id infoId, czb_wechat_vip_apply.user_name phoneName, czb_wechat_vip_apply.phone_num phoneNumber FROM ( SELECT c.user_id, c.create_at, c.user_type, c.bindingId, c.user_name, b.user_account FROM czb_user c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.user_id, d.user_account,d.user_name FROM czb_user d ) AS b ON c.bindingId = b.user_id ) AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN czb_user_income_info ON a.user_id = czb_user_income_info.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN czb_wechat_vip_apply on a.user_id = czb_wechat_vip_apply.user_id
a.user_type = 2
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{name},'%')
and a.user_account like concat('%', #{account},'%')
and a.create_at between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
ORDER BY withdraw DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO czb.czb_income_log ( record_id, amount, type, info_id, before_change_income, remark, souse_id, withdraw_to, withdraw_name, withdraw_account, commission_got_user, create_at, update_at ) VALUES ( #{recordId}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{infoId}, #{beforeChangeIncome}, #{remark}, #{sourceId}, #{withdrawTo}, #{withdrawName}, #{withdrawAmount}, #{commissionGotUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
